Arithmetic error occurred while counting 'commentsCount/usersCount': don't divide by 0! Arithmetic error occurred while counting 'commentsCount/postsCount': don't divide by 0!
Preparing to execute test #5 Testing CalculateAdvStatistics() when number of comments is greater than number of posts
